product_description: Spicy Sprouts, packaged in a 4 oz. clamshell container or 85 gram package.  The product is sold under Sprouters Northwest or LifeForce brand.    The Sprouters Northwest, 4 oz., has UPC is 8 15098 00202 3.   The LifeForce, 85 gram, has  UPC 8 51042 00401 9.    The Sprouters Northwest, 4 oz., is labeled in parts: "***SPICY SPROUTS***a blend of clover and radish sprouts***Sprouters NORTHWEST, INC.***KEEP REFRIGERATED***NET WT. 4.0 oz.***DISTRIBUTED BY: SPROUTERS NORTHWEST, INC., KENT, WA 98032***SproutersNorthwest.com***".    The LifeForce, 85 gram, is labeled in parts: "***SPICY SPROUTS***a blend of clover and radish sprouts***LifeForce***KEEP REFRIGERATED***NET WT 85g***PRODUCED FOR: LIFE FORCE FOODS LLC, BALTIMORE, MD 21202***www.BroccoSprouts.com***".
reason_for_recall: Spicy Sprouts are recalled due to a potential contamination with Listeria monocytogenes.
code_info: The Best by Dates are including all and up to 2/17/2013
